name: AWS DynamoDB
description: The Sumo Logic App for Amazon DynamoDB is a unified logs and metrics (ULM) App which provides operational insights into your DynamoDB solution. The App includes Dashboards that allow you to monitor key metrics and view the throttle events, errors, latency, and help you plan the capacity of your DynamoDB solution.

children.name: 1. AWS DynamoDB - Capacity Planning
children.description: See the details of your DynamoDB capacity including the provisioned read/write consumed, read/write throttle events, and throttled requests.
children.title: 1. AWS DynamoDB - Capacity Planning

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ProvisionedReadCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConsumedReadCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ProvisionedWriteCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConsumedWriteCapacityUnits Statistic=Maximum
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ThrottledRequests Statistic=sum (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*)
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ThrottledRequests Statistic=sum (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*)

namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ThrottledRequests Statistic=sum (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*)

namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ThrottledRequests Statistic=sum (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*)
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ReadThrottleEvents Statistic=sum
namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=WriteThrottleEvents Statistic=sum
region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} metric=AccountMaxReads Statistic=Average
region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} metric=AccountMaxTableLevelReads Statistic=Average
region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} metric=AccountMaxWrites Statistic=Average
region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} account={{account}} metric=AccountMaxTableLevelWrites Statistic=Average

children.name: 1. AWS DynamoDB - Overview
children.description: See the overview of your DynamoDB environment including the events, errors, requests, users, and latency.
children.title: 1. AWS DynamoDB - Overview

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} metric=AccountProvisionedWriteCapacityUtilization Statistic=Average | avg
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} metric=UserErrors Statistic=SampleCount | sum
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} metric=SystemErrors Statistic=SampleCount | sum
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConditionalCheckFailedRequests Statistic=SampleCount | sum
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=TransactionConflict Statistic=SampleCount | sum

namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*) | sum by entity

namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*) | sum by entity
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=SampleCount | sum by entity
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} metric=UserErrors Statistic=SampleCount
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} metric=SystemErrors Statistic=SampleCount | sum by account

Region={{region}} account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| timeslice 5m
| count by EventName, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

Region={{region}} account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode errorMessage
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| count as Count by ErrorCode, ErrorMessage
| sort by Count
| limit 10

account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} Region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| count as Count by UserName
| sort Count 
| limit 5
namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} metric=AccountProvisionedReadCapacityUtilization Statistic=Average | avg

account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} Region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| count as count by EventName
| sort count 
| limit 5

children.name: 2. AWS DynamoDB  - Latency and Errors
children.description: See the details of errors and latency of your DynamoDB including the user error, system error, failed request, and latency.
children.title: 2. AWS DynamoDB  - Latency and Errors

queries.queryString: namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*get* or operation=*scan* or operation=*query*)

namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} account={{account}} entity={{entity}} metric=SuccessfulRequestLatency Statistic=Average (operation=*update* or operation=*put* or operation=*delete* or operation=*write*)
account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=ConditionalCheckFailedRequests Statistic=SampleCount
account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} metric=TransactionConflict Statistic=SampleCount

children.name: 3. AWS DynamoDB - Events
children.description: See the details on events in your DynamoDB including the location, users, errors, updates, creations, and deletions to tables.
children.title: 3. AWS DynamoDB - Events

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by EventName
| sort by _count
| limit 5

account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| count by EventName, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName 
| fillmissing timeslice (1h)

account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode errorMessage
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}" and !isEmpty(ErrorCode)
| count

account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as count by UserName
| sort count 
| limit 10

account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode errorMessage
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}" and !isEmpty(ErrorCode)
| count as Count by ErrorCode, ErrorMessage, EventName, UserName, SourceIp
| sort by Count
| limit 20

account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName", "requestParameters.keySchema", "requestParameters.attributeDefinitions", "userAgent", "responseElements.tableDescription.provisionedThroughput", "userIdentity.sessionContext.attributes.mfaAuthenticated" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName, TableSchema, AttributeDefinition, UserAgent, ProvisionedThroughput, MFAAuthenticated nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| formatDate(_messageTime, "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss:SSS") as MessageDate
| count as Count by MessageDate, EventName, Entity, UserName, SourceIp, MFAAuthenticated
| sort by MessageDate
| fields MessageDate, EventName, Entity, UserName, SourceIp, MFAAuthenticated

account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by SourceIp
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = SourceIp
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code

children.name: 4. AWS DynamoDB - Threat Intel
children.description: See the details of IP threats including the count, location, and highly malicious IP threats.
children.title: 4. AWS DynamoDB - Threat Intel

queries.queryString:
region={{region}} account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where SourceIp != "0.0.0.0" and SourceIp != "127.0.0.1"
| count as ip_count by SourceIp
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=SourceIp 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| sum (ip_count) as threat_count

region={{region}} account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where SourceIp != "0.0.0.0" and SourceIp != "127.0.0.1"
| timeslice 5m
| count as ip_count by SourceIp, Entity
| lookup Type, Actor, Raw, ThreatLevel as MaliciousConfidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=SourceIp 
| json field=Raw "labels[*].name" as LabelName 
| replace(LabelName, "\\/","->") as LabelName
| replace(LabelName, "\""," ") as LabelName
| where type="ip_address" and MaliciousConfidence="high"
| if (isEmpty(Actor), "Unassigned", Actor) as Actor
| sum (ip_count) as ThreatCount by SourceIp, MaliciousConfidence, Entity, Actor, LabelName
| sort by ThreatCount

region={{region}} account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where SourceIp != "0.0.0.0" and SourceIp != "127.0.0.1"
| count as ip_count by SourceIp
| lookup Type, Actor, Raw, ThreatLevel as MaliciousConfidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=SourceIp 
| json field=Raw "labels[*].name" as LabelName 
| replace(LabelName, "\\/","->") as LabelName
| replace(LabelName, "\""," ") as LabelName
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(MaliciousConfidence)
| if (isEmpty(Actor), "Unassigned", Actor) as Actor
| sum (ip_count) as ThreatCount by SourceIp, MaliciousConfidence, Actor, LabelName
| sort by ThreatCount

region={{region}} account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where SourceIp != "0.0.0.0" and SourceIp != "127.0.0.1"
| count as ip_count by SourceIp
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=SourceIp 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address"
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| count by malicious_confidence
| sort by _count

region={{region}} account={{account}} namespace={{namespace}} "\"eventSource\":\"dynamodb.amazonaws.com\""
| json "eventName", "awsRegion", "requestParameters.tableName", "sourceIPAddress", "userIdentity.userName", "userIdentity.sessionContext.sessionIssuer.userName" as EventName, Region, Entity, SourceIp, UserName, ContextUserName nodrop
| if (isEmpty(UserName), ContextUserName, UserName) as UserName
| where tolowercase(Entity) matches "{{entity}}"
| where SourceIp != "0.0.0.0" and SourceIp != "127.0.0.1"
| count as ip_count by SourceIp
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=SourceIp 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| count by SourceIp
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = SourceIp
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count
